tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    appointment_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    appointment_reason TEXT,
    reminder_sent BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME,
    doctor_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    patient_phone VARCHAR(15),
    patient_email VARCHAR(50),
    patient_address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE reminders (
    reminder_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    appointment_id UUID,
    reminder_datetime TIMESTAMP,
    reminder_message TEXT,
    reminder_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME,
    appointment_type VARCHAR,
    appointment_status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR,
    patient_phone_number VARCHAR,
    patient_email VARCHAR,
    patient_address VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE reminders (
    reminder_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    reminder_date DATE,
    reminder_time TIME,
    reminder_message TEXT,
    reminder_status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    patient_email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    patient_phone VARCHAR(20),
    patient_age INT,
    patient_gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE doctors (
    doctor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    doctor_specialty VARCHAR(100),
    doctor_email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    doctor_phone VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    doctor_id UUID,
    appointment_date TIMESTAMP,
    appointment_type VARCHAR(50),
    appointment_status VARCHAR(20)
);
